title: Gippsland All-Cottage Luxury Escape with Boutique Wine Tastings & Local Breakfast Hamper
description:
Leave city life behind in favour of rolling pastures and blue gums at this collection of countryside cottages, perched within 100 acres of Gippsland nature reserve.

These fully self-contained properties deliver the calm and comfort of country living to any occasion. Soak in romance at The Nest, an intimate one-bedder with a freestanding outdoor bath. Switch off with loved ones among sprawling vineyards in the two-bedroom Retreat or Spa cottage and entertain on the viewing deck of the four-bedroom Lodge, complete with a sun-soaked living area and open fireplace.

Fine dining at the onsite restaurant features a weekly-changing seasonal menu, rife with freshly-plucked ingredients from the kitchen garden, pasture-raised meats and artisan cheeses. Pair your meal with a sommelier-approved drop of single-estate wine vinified by award-winning maker Marcus Satchell.
offer_address: 322 Lays Road, Willung South, Victoria 3847, Australia
